00047 // CSoundResource Description
00048 //
00049 //    This class is meant to house the buffer that sound players will read
00050 //    It will encapsulate the concept of "A Sound", not to be confused
00051 //    with "A Sound Process"(CSoundProcess)
00052 //
00054 
00055 class CSoundResource  
00056 {
00057 public:         
00058         CSoundResource(const std::wstring &soundFile);
00059         virtual ~CSoundResource();
00060 
00061         char const *GetPCMBuffer() const { return m_PCMBuffer; }
00062         int GetPCMBufferSize() const { return m_PCMBufferSize; }
00063         enum SoundType GetSoundType() { return m_SoundType; }
00064         WAVEFORMATEX const *GetFormat() { return &m_WavFormatEx; }
00065         int GetLengthMilli() const { return m_LengthMilli; }
00066 
00067         virtual bool VInitialize();
00068 
00069 private:
00070         //Disable the 3 Amigos of C++ that get secretly generated with every class:
00071         // default construction, copy construction, and assignment
00072         CSoundResource();       
00073         CSoundResource(const CSoundResource& rhs);
00074         CSoundResource& operator=(const CSoundResource& rhs);
00075 
00076         //Members...
00077         enum SoundType m_SoundType;
00078         bool m_bInitialized;
00079 
00080         char *m_PCMBuffer; 
00081         int m_PCMBufferSize; 
00082         WAVEFORMATEX m_WavFormatEx;
00083         int m_LengthMilli;
00084 
00085         const std::wstring m_SoundFile;
00086 
00087         bool ParseWave(FILE *fd);
00088         bool ParseOgg(FILE *fd);
00089 };
